events.message: I received my order yesterday, but the product is broken and does not work properly. There is a large scratch on the surface.
The system has categorized this case as Product Defect due to keywords indicating damage and scratches in the customer's message.
The case has been assigned to support agent Alex who specializes in product defects and returns.
Hello, this is Alex from customer support. I’m sorry to hear about the issue with your product. I’m here to help you resolve it.
Could you please provide photos of the damaged product and the packaging? This will help us process your case faster.
I have attached the photos showing the scratch and the faulty part. It was disappointing to receive it in this condition.
Thank you for the photos. We can offer you a full replacement or a refund. Please let us know which option you prefer.
I would like to proceed with a replacement, as I still want to try the product without defects.
We have arranged for a replacement to be shipped to your address. You will receive tracking details shortly.
We wanted to confirm that your replacement product has arrived and is in good condition. Please let us know if everything is satisfactory.
Since you have confirmed the replacement is fine, we are closing this support case. Thank you for your patience and understanding.
